This game is absolutely breathtaking. After just one playthrough, it has reached the top of my list for personal favorite video games. The story is incredibly intriguing as you learn about the science facility and the characters that inhabit it. GLaDOS' humor is dry and sarcastic and always brings a laugh and smile. Wheatley is an absolute joy to listen to. The gameplay is very fun and parts can leave you on the edge of your seat. The only complaint I have is that some puzzles can feel very confusing, but it always ends up being because I wasn't seeing the bigger picture.

Overall, this game is an absolute MUST PLAY for any gamer ever.

This game is really good, nice story and very original.

Unlike most adventure games which make you solve logic puzzles or search for clues to a mystery, Portal 2 makes you think in terms of physics and geometry.  Imagination plays as much a role as quick reflexes, and woe to those who can't shoot the moon!

Um dos melhores jogos que já joguei. O conceito de portais é muito bem feito neste jogo, com puzzles que do início ao fim vai ficando mais difícil, e tem a história que está presente o tempo todo com seu humor no ponto certo  e algumas vezes um momento com alívio cômico. Mas também tem DLCs, o modo co-op que é ÓTIMO, as conquistas que são um desafio maior, por exemplo uma de resolver um puzzle sem tocar em uma caixa

[h1]PORTAL 2[/h1]
[b]Portal 2 is Valve's blockbuster sequel to 2007's GOTY Portal. Originally F-Stop before becoming a direct sequel.

Released April 18th, 2011, Portal 2 is the critically acclaimed sequel to Portal. Innovating on Portals and new puzzle mechanics, Portal 2 improves on everything the first introduced. Story, graphics, puzzles, gels, bridges and introducing a brand new co-op campaign, Portal 2 has everything a fan can look forward to in a rich sequel. Also supports Workshop Tools allowing custom content for Solo and Co-op Chambers throughout.

Players will explore never-before-seen areas of the Aperture Science Labs and be reunited with GLaDOS, the occasionally murderous computer companion who guided them through the original game. Cooperative mode features its own entirely separate campaign with a unique story, test chambers, and two new player characters. This new mode forces players to reconsider everything they thought they knew about portals. Success will require them to not just act cooperatively, but to think cooperatively.

Portal 2 takes place (9999999) years after Portal. Still set in Aperture Science, Wheatley awakes and rescues you to aid in escaping. Unfortunately GlaDOS reboots and cancels your plans of escaping for more testing. Now you and Wheatley must find a new way of escaping while stopping GlaDOS for good.

Portal 2 is considered one of the greatest games of all time. I highly recommend Portal 2 to anybody who enjoys Valve games and the first Portal. There's a huge atmosphere change, so that could be a turnoff. Portal 2 is still one of my favorite games of all time, go play it!
